description: personal study ID composed by the first authors’ first surname_year of publication_first title word
name of data subset – can include different experiments within data set/ different training conditions/ pre-test data/ etc
year the data point was obtained
month the data point was obtained
day of the month the data point was obtained
species of individuals participating in the study -bonobo/chimpanzee/orangutan
set of trials - mostly occurring on the same day - usually numerical
presentation of the experiment to the participants - usually numerical
condition in which participant had to discriminate between tools on the basis of their rigidity-manipulation/observation/visual_static
10 different 3-tool sets participants had to select based on their rigidity – 1/2/3/4/5/6/
tool sets administered by experimenters in a visual static condition only presenting the tools - set 1/set 2/set 3
whether participants choose the right tool depending if the apparatus required to use a rigid or a flexible tool – yes/no
whether participants selected the tool and then tried to use it – yes/no
participants choice depending on whether the apparatus required using a rigid or a flexible tool - rigid/flexible
